course.title: MAT 3153 Introduction to Topology (3 units)
course.desc: Sets, functions, countability. Topology of the real line and of Euclidean space, compactness and connectedness, continuous functions. An introduction to algebraic methods in topology: homotopies and the winding number of curves in the plane, the index of a vector field in the plane, or the classification of surfaces.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: (MAT 2120, MAT 2121) or (MAT 2120, MAT 2322) or (MAT 2122, MAT 2125).
